metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8564 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Kubernetes clusters using a logging level of at least 4, processing a malformed docker config file will result in the contents of the docker config file being leaked, which can include pull secrets or other registry credentials. This affects < v1.19.3, < v1.18.10, < v1.17.13.

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
